thread.title: This pic of Harbhajan Singh's daughter Hinaya with 'chacha' Yuvraj Singh is super cute!
thread.title_full: This pic of Harbhajan Singh's daughter Hinaya with 'chacha' Yuvraj Singh is super cute! - Sports

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: This pic of Harbhajan Singh's daughter Hinaya with 'chacha' Yuvraj Singh is super cute!
text:
Indian all-rounder Yuvraj Singh has proved time and again that he's quite the power-packed performer on the cricket pitch but off it he has a softer side.
Yuvraj recently posted a picture on his Instagram account and it is way too cute.
Yuvi is seen holding his teammate Harbhajan Singh and his wife Geeta Basra's little daughter Hinaya Heer Plaha. Yuvraj captioned the photo saying: Little angel hinaya! She likes her chacha @harbhajan3 @geetabasra
  Little angel ðÂÂÂÂÂÂ hinaya! She likes her chacha @harbhajan3 @geetabasra 
A photo posted by Yuvraj Singh (@yuvisofficial) onFeb 9, 2017 at 5:04am PST
Harbhajan Singh and Geeta Basra became parents to the little one in July last year.
Yuvraj Singh was married to actress Hazel Keech in November 2016.
